m_u@2GeV.description: 2.2(5|4)e-3 GeV, PDG2018, m_up in MS-bar scheme at 2 GeV

m_d@2GeV.description: 4.7(5|3)e-3 GeV, PDG2018, m_down in MS-bar scheme at 2 GeV

m_s@2GeV.description: 95(9|3)e-3 GeV, PDG2018, m_strange in MS-bar scheme at 2 GeV

m_c@m_c.description: 1.275(25|35) GeV, PDG2018, m_c in MS-bar scheme at m_c, correspond to the pole mass 1.67(7) GeV

m_b@m_b.description: 4.18(4|3) GeV, PDG2018, m_b in MS-bar scheme at m_b, correspond to the pole mass 4.78(6) GeV

m_t@m_t.description: 160.0(48|43) GeV, D0 (1104.2887), m_t in MS-bar scheme at m_t

m_t.description: 173.0(4) GeV, PDG2018, m_t in Monte Carlo scheme

m_Z.description: 91.1876(21) GeV, PDG2018, BW mass, 34 MeV greater than the real part of the pole

alpha_EW@m_Z.description: 1/[127.955(10)], PDG2018, fine-structure constant with 5-quark scheme at m_Z

alpha_s@m_Z.description: 0.1181(11), PDG2018, strong coupling constant at m_Z

alpha_s@m_tau.description: 0.325(15), PDG2018, strong coupling constant at m_tau
